00038 typedef struct SweepParams {
00039         std::string dirName;    
00040         SpotterType spotType;   
00041         data_t minCutoff;               
00042         data_t maxCutoff;               
00043         data_t cutoffIncrement;

00045         steps_t maxWarp;

00047         float minScaleFactor;   
00048         float maxScaleFactor;   
00049         float scaleFactorIncrement; 
00050         
00051         //constructor so it'll use default values
00052         SweepParams(std::string dir, SpotterType spotterType);
00053         
00054 } SweepParams;
